faqs.a: {{app.brandname}} is a mod management application designed to make it easy for users to not only modify their game, but also list modified servers, and make downloading their required mods and joining them, considerably easier.

faqs.q: How to set Local Palworld Game Installation Path?
faqs.a: To set the local Palworld game installation path, click on the settings icon in the top right corner of the application, and then click on the 'Game Installation Path' option. You can then enter the path to your Palworld game installation folder. For steam users this might look like `C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Palworld`. For Xbox Gamepass users: `C:/XboxGames/Palworld/Content`
